places.name: Lalbagh Botanical Garden
places.description: A 240-acre garden with diverse flora and a stunning glasshouse.
places.tip: Visit early morning for a peaceful walk.

places.name: Cubbon Park
places.description: A green escape in the heart of the city, perfect for picnics and jogging.
places.tip: Best visited on weekends when the park is vehicle-free.

places.name: Vidhana Soudha
places.description: Majestic government building and architectural landmark of Bengaluru.
places.tip: Capture night views when it's illuminated beautifully.

places.name: Mysore Palace
places.description: A royal residence featuring Indo-Saracenic architecture and a dazzling Durbar Hall.
places.tip: Visit on Sunday evenings for the illuminated view.

places.name: Chamundi Hills
places.description: A sacred hill offering panoramic city views and a temple dedicated to Chamundeshwari.
places.tip: Try the drive up the hill during sunrise.

places.name: Brindavan Gardens
places.description: Famous for musical fountains and the Krishnarajasagar Dam.
places.tip: The fountain show starts after sunset daily.

places.name: Panambur Beach
places.description: One of the cleanest beaches in Karnataka with water sports and sunsets.
places.tip: Evenings are perfect for street food and sea breeze.

places.name: St. Aloysius Chapel
places.description: Historic church known for its beautiful frescoes painted by an Italian artist.
places.tip: Photography inside may be restricted — check beforehand.

places.name: Mangaladevi Temple
places.description: Ancient temple from which Mangalore derives its name.
places.tip: Attend the morning puja for a spiritual experience.

places.name: Sri Krishna Temple
places.description: A famous temple dedicated to Lord Krishna, known for its unique window darshan.
places.tip: Avoid weekends for less crowd.

places.name: Malpe Beach
places.description: A clean beach offering boat rides to St. Mary's Island.
places.tip: Visit during sunset for stunning views.

places.name: St. Mary's Island
places.description: A small island famous for hexagonal basalt rocks.
places.tip: Last boat to island leaves by 5 PM.

places.name: Abbey Falls
places.description: Picturesque waterfall surrounded by coffee plantations.
places.tip: Best visited right after the monsoon season.

places.name: Dubare Elephant Camp
places.description: Experience elephant feeding and bathing up close.
places.tip: Morning sessions are the most interactive.

places.name: Raja's Seat
places.description: Viewpoint offering breathtaking sunsets over the valley.
places.tip: Don’t miss the musical fountain in the evening.

places.name: Mullayanagiri Peak
places.description: Tallest peak in Karnataka, perfect for trekking and scenic drives.
places.tip: Reach early morning to avoid mist blocking the view.

places.name: Hebbe Falls
places.description: Two-tiered waterfall amidst dense forest, accessible via jeep ride.
places.tip: Carry a waterproof bag for electronics.

places.name: Baba Budangiri
places.description: Historic mountain range famous for coffee plantations.
places.tip: Drive carefully — roads can be narrow near the summit.

places.name: Om Beach
places.description: Iconic beach shaped like the Hindu symbol ‘Om’.
places.tip: Try banana boat rides for fun.

places.name: Kudle Beach
places.description: Laid-back beach perfect for yoga and sunsets.
places.tip: Stay at beachside cafes for great morning views.

places.name: Mahabaleshwar Temple
places.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Lord Shiva.
places.tip: Photography is not allowed inside the main sanctum.

places.name: Virupaksha Temple
places.description: A UNESCO World Heritage temple dedicated to Lord Shiva.
places.tip: Visit early to avoid heat and crowds.

places.name: Vittala Temple
places.description: Famous for its musical pillars and stone chariot.
places.tip: Best photographed during sunrise.

places.name: Hampi Bazaar
places.description: Ancient market street with ruins and artifacts.
places.tip: Explore with a bicycle rental from the nearby stalls.
